PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.BookImpl.Binary module

.xls workbook’s engine class.

History (most recent first): 2.0.1 2023/3/11 Created.

class PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.BookImpl.Binary.EngineXLS

Bases: EngineBase

classmethod read(file: str | IOBase | bytes) → list[Sheet]

Read excel file and return a list of sheets. Subclasses should implement this method.

Parameters:

file (Union[str, io.IOBase, bytes]) – The file to read.

Returns:

A list of sheets.

Return type:

list[Sheet]

classmethod save(file: str | IOBase | None, sheets: list[Sheet])

Save a list of sheets to an excel file. Subclasses should implement this method.

Parameters:

  • file (Union[str, io.IOBase, None]) – The file to save to.

  • sheets (list[Sheet]) – A list of sheets to save.
